Origins: Flight attendant Karen Perry of Gold Canyon, Arizona, a single mother, lost her three young children in a small airplane crash which also killed her ex-husband on the day before Thanksgiving 2011:
Description: video platformvideo managementvideo solutionsvideo player video platformvideo managementvideo solutionsvideo player
Example: [Collected via e-mail, November 2011] CAN EVERYONE PLEASE STOP THEIR GAMES FOR 2 MINUTES AND RE-POST THIS. PRAY FOR THE Karen Perrry FAMILY. SHE LOST ALL THREE OF HER CHILDREN IN A PLANE CRASH HERE IN ARIZONA OVER THANKSGIVING. I DON'T KNOW THIS FAMILY, BUT I DO KNOW THAT ONLY GOD CAN HEAL THEIR LIVES NOW. PLEASE ..RE-POST THIS AND START A FB PRAYER CHAIN. PLEASE IF YOU DO NOT BELIEVE IN GOD, STILL PASS THIS ON. THIS FAMILY HAS LOST SO MUCH. IT WONT HURT YOU BUT MIGHT DO SOME GOOD. THANK YOU
Claim: Prayers are requested for Karen Perry, who lost her three children in a Thanksgiving-eve plane crash.
